summary: Project to implement focused, isolated changes in two areas: Art Gallery upload routing (private vs public) with BigInt-safe saving and no changes to existing items; and a Kids YouTube Videos Hub that plays non-copyright videos on-site while redirecting restricted videos to YouTube.

existing_features.title: Update `frontend/src/pages/VideoHubPage.tsx` so that selecting a channel plays videos directly on the website when the channel is marked as allowed to embed, and otherwise prompts the user to watch on YouTube for channels marked as embed-blocked.

new_feature_requests.summary: Art Gallery Fix: On Upload Artwork, save to My Art (private) when Share Publicly is unchecked, otherwise save to Public Gallery; convert any BigInt to string before saving; do not modify anything outside Art Gallery; keep existing gallery items untouched.

Kids YouTube Videos Hub: Play videos on the website only when they are not copyright-restricted; otherwise show/play them via YouTube (e.g., link/embed to YouTube channel); make focused changes only without impacting other CRUD/features.

projectName: Kids YouTube Videos Hub: Play embeddable videos on-site, otherwise redirect to YouTube
